name: searxng
description: SearxNG is a self-hosted privacy-respecting metasearch engine that aggregates queries across multiple search providers. It offers customization and protects users from tracking.
features: Metasearch engine: Aggregates results from multiple search engines for comprehensive coverage.
Privacy protection: Removes tracking and doesn't store search queries or user data.
Customizable sources: Select which search engines to query for different content types.
No ads: Delivers clean search results without advertisements or sponsored content.
Instant answers: Provides quick facts, calculations, and conversions directly in results.
Category search: Filter results by web, images, videos, news, maps, and more.
Theme support: Choose from multiple themes or customize appearance with CSS.
API access: Query search results programmatically via JSON API for integrations.
Language support: Search in multiple languages with localized interfaces.
Tor compatibility: Works over Tor network for enhanced anonymity.
Plugin system: Extend functionality with custom plugins for additional features.
Result preferences: Save search preferences and customize result ranking algorithms.
